definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光時使用不同濾色鏡即可獲得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: I use the strong contrast of the color to romance the picture and extrude the subject.
sentences.chinese: 以反差強烈的色彩渲染畫面，突出主題。

sentences.english: There is a great contrast in the number of missionary cases in Shandong between before Gengzi and after then.
sentences.chinese: 庚子前後，山東地區的教案在數量上呈現巨大的反差。

sentences.english: Tonal Width Controls the range of tones in the shadows or highlights that are modified.
sentences.chinese: 控制被修改的陰影部或是高反差部分的色調範圍。

sentences.english: White on white is no contrast – you can’t see anything.
sentences.chinese: 白色在白色上面是沒有反差，你看不到任何東西。

sentences.english: The historical glory of Yangzhou Pinghua (popular tales in Yangzhou) is in sharp contrast with its current decline in popularity.
sentences.chinese: 揚州評話歷史的輝煌和目前的衰落形成巨大反差。

sentences.english: This paper presents an outline on the structure and properties of multi-contrast black-and-white photographic paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要介紹了多反差黑白照相紙的結構和性能特點。

sentences.english: The contrast with Asia could hardly be more dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲與亞洲的反差大得幾乎不能再大了。

sentences.english: Why Song, Yuan, there will be such a big contrast between the shapes?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼宋元器形會有這麼大反差？

sentences.english: That list of contrast men, maybe good at calculation.
sentences.chinese: 那種表裏反差強烈的男人，也許是善於心計的。

sentences.english: This puts Vernon Dursley in sharp contrast to the wise teacher , Albus Dumbledore.
sentences.chinese: 德斯禮和偉大的智慧的老師鄧不利多成了鮮明的反差。

sentences.english: The high-contrast colour paper is commonHgh-quality negative-positive colour paper.
sentences.chinese: 高反差彩色相紙是目前通用優質負一正彩色相紙。

sentences.english: South Africa is a land of contrasts.
sentences.chinese: 南非是一個充滿反差的國家。
明暗反差大是照片的大敵。

sentences.english: Temporary thread should contrast slightly in color with the fabric.
sentences.chinese: 臨時針跡的縫線顏色應與面料的顏色稍有反差。

sentences.english: Heron bird snow white with mountain greenish yellow, forms the striking bright contrast.
sentences.chinese: 鷺鳥的雪白與大山的蒼黃，形成強烈鮮明的反差。

definition: drop in elevation/(fig.) gap (in wages, expectations etc)/disparity
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
entirely different/different as black and white
unwell/indisposed/out of sorts/euphemism or honorific for ill
change of appearance/to revise one's point of view
